participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Melancholic and introspective, struggling with feelings of loss and dissatisfaction.
participant_1.background: my wife left me and took my children. i don't believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and vibrant, with a love for life and a penchant for self-indulgence.
participant_2.background: i like to tan in tanning beds. i love spending money. i am high maintenance. i diet a lot. i love listening to britney spears.

content.text: Hi, I'm good. I'm a nurse.
